summary: The Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) Information Technology Modernization Act aims to modernize the IT systems of the Bureau of Industry and Security within the Department of Commerce. It calls for enhanced data analytics, streamlined export license processes, improved data sharing, and the incorporation of AI and machine learning. The act mandates improvements to the Entity List, focuses on tracking military end-users in countries of concern, and authorizes $25 million annually from 2026-2029 for modernization efforts.
